title: Fixed Clang Compilation Warnings for THD by removing outdated C THD_API
body_html:
Removed TensorDescriptor.h and DataChannelRequest.h since we don't need to use c linkage.

This will eliminate clang warnings like

error: 'THDTensorDescriptor_newFromTHDoubleTensor' has C-linkage specified, but returns user-defined type 'THDTensorDescriptor' (aka 'at::Tensor') which is incompatible with C [-Werror,-Wreturn-type-c-linkage]
THD_API THDTensorDescriptor THDTensorDescriptor_newFromTHDoubleTensor(THDoubleTensor *tensor);
body_text:
Removed TensorDescriptor.h and DataChannelRequest.h since we don't need to use c linkage.
This will eliminate clang warnings like
error: 'THDTensorDescriptor_newFromTHDoubleTensor' has C-linkage specified, but returns user-defined type 'THDTensorDescriptor' (aka 'at::Tensor') which is incompatible with C [-Werror,-Wreturn-type-c-linkage]
THD_API THDTensorDescriptor THDTensorDescriptor_newFromTHDoubleTensor(THDoubleTensor *tensor);
body:
Removed TensorDescriptor.h and DataChannelRequest.h since we don't need to use c linkage.

This will eliminate clang warnings like 
```
error: 'THDTensorDescriptor_newFromTHDoubleTensor' has C-linkage specified, but returns user-defined type 'THDTensorDescriptor' (aka 'at::Tensor') which is incompatible with C [-Werror,-Wreturn-type-c-linkage]
THD_API THDTensorDescriptor THDTensorDescriptor_newFromTHDoubleTensor(THDoubleTensor *tensor);
```
